channel.title: XML on A Place for Poor Examples
channel.description: Recent content in XML on A Place for Poor Examples

item.title: Beautiful LINQ to Xml
item.description: Is there anything better in life than finding a better way to do something? An easier commute, a better night’s sleep, a tastier cake recipe? In starting the Nike+ importer for www.runningahead.com, I knew I was going to have to deal with a bit of XML. Which used to mean XPath. Not so much anymore. LINQ to XML, you rock my world. It turns XML like this… <extendedDataList> <extendedData dataType="distance" intervalType="time" intervalUnit="s" intervalValue="10"> 0.
